author: sky.cactus
content: Re: coinbase.  I think Danny was right that I was conflating things a little.  I *do* think there is value in having an address for the block builder, and a different address for the validator who submits the block.

author: sky.cactus
content: Both are useful addresses to have, but currently we only have one address as part of the block and exposed to the EVM.  This means that we need to pick which participant in the system gets visibility, and which doesn't since the one we don't pick will end up with invisible payments on some off-chain network.
